Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Cozy local pub with a household cat. Didn't try the food but they had a good selection of drinks.

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Super small local pub. 10 beers on tap 100 bottles and finger food. Truly a local hangout with friendly staff and a friendly cat

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: We popped up in this bar randomly for a beer and it was quite a pleasant surprise. The atmosphere was very cozy and unlike other tipical dutch bars, it was not very noisy. There's also a good selection of beers. The owners are very friendly. Recommend checking out this place.

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Extremely racist couple that run the place, no music, smells like deep fried chicken skin. very good beer menu though. Avoid at all cost, there are plenty of bars around that serve you well.

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Amazing place, really friendly owners and amazing choice of beers! Loved the experience, I’ll come back for sure

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: High cracklady not being able to do a normal conversation behind the bar. Don’t know if she’s the owner but trashtalking customers isn’t very charming. They had some nice tap beers though. But she had no idea of what they were or anything so that doesn’t really do it either..

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: A great selection of beers and phenomenal hosts!!! A must visit!

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Best cafe in town. Steve & Adelina will be happy to serve you a beer or a chat. Everyone is welcome.

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Very friendly and calm place, with a nice beer selection that change from time to time, and some finger food (including pretty decent bitterballen and kaastengels!) …

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Lovely beer cafe! Traditionally styled, with very large selection of beers! Super friendly!

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Possibly the best beer selection in town, great prices, super nice owners and an extremely friendly cat. Good local vibe, no tourists (thank god).

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Fantastic, authentic place! Beer like nowhere else! From locally brewed IPA to dark Belgium basterds! (And yes, about 80 different kinds in the middle)

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Locally owned with POOL table :-). This is a good place to go to if you just want to have a beer and some beer-snacks with friends. Owners are super nice.

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Relaxed atmosphere and knowledgeable bartender, has a great rustic feel alongside its massive  contemporary selection of beers.

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Cozy local bar, friendly knowledgeable service with unique beers

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Its great fun. Great bar. Some different beers. And not too  busy its good

Name: Café Westerdok
Review Text: Excellent pub. Great selection of beers, pleasant and very friendly owners.

Review Text: Great bar with beautiful interior and a great amount of beers!
